      • pagingSql

        public static String pagingSql(String conn,
                               String sql,
                               int page,
                               int size)
                        throws SQLException
        compose paged sql, e.g. for Oracle: select * from (sql) t where rownum > 0 and row num < 14
        Note: this is not efficiency. You should do in appendable or stream style if an AST is available, like that one in DASemantext#pagingStream().
        Parameters:
        sql -
        page -
        size -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        SQLException
